events.name: PostCreated
events.description: Triggered when a new post is created for products.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: Triggered when an existing post is modified.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: Triggered when a post is removed from the system.

events.name: PostPublished
events.description: Triggered when a post is made live for viewing.

events.name: PostDrafted
events.description: Triggered when a post is initially created as a draft.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: Triggered when a new post is created for products.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: Triggered when an existing post is modified.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: Triggered when a post is removed from the system.

commands.name: PublishPost
commands.description: Triggered when a post is made live for viewing.

commands.name: DraftPost
commands.description: Triggered when a post is initially created as a draft.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with user management for authoring posts.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with inventory to tag products in posts.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with notifications to alert users about new posts.

integrationPoints.name: AnalyticsService
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with analytics to track post interactions.
